00195    * Default constructor.

00197    template <class Interaction>
00198    MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::MdPairPotentialImpl(System& system)
00199     : MdPairPotential(system),
00200       interactionPtr_(0),
00201       isCopy_(false)
00202    {  interactionPtr_ = new Interaction; }

00204    /* 
00205    * Constructor, copy from McPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>.
00206    */
00207    template <class Interaction>
00208    MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::MdPairPotentialImpl(
00209                          McPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>& other)
00210     : MdPairPotential(other.system()),
00211       interactionPtr_(&other.interaction()),
00212       isCopy_(true)
00213    {}
00214  
00215    /* 
00216    * Destructor. 
00217    */
00218    template <class Interaction>
00219    MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::~MdPairPotentialImpl() 
00220    {
00221       if (interactionPtr_ && !isCopy_) {
00222          delete interactionPtr_;
00223          interactionPtr_ = 0;
00224       }
00225    }
00226 
00227    template <class Interaction>
00228    void MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::readParam(std::istream& in)
00229    {
00230       readBegin(in, "MdPairPotential");
00231 
00232       // Read pair potential parameters only if not a copy.
00233       // This block is not indented or surrounded by brackets.
00234       if (!isCopy_) {
00235          interaction().setNAtomType(simulation().nAtomType());
00236          bool nextIndent = false;
00237          readParamComposite(in, interaction(), nextIndent);
00238       }
00239 
00240       read<Boundary>(in, "maxBoundary", maxBoundary_);
00241       readParamComposite(in, pairList_);
00242 
00243       // Allocate the PairList 
00244       double cutoff = interaction().maxPairCutoff();
00245       pairList_.allocate(simulation().atomCapacity(), 
00246                          maxBoundary_, cutoff);
00247 
00248       readEnd(in);
00249    }

00256                                         int iAtomType, int jAtomType) const
00257    { return interaction().energy(rsq, iAtomType, jAtomType); }

00264                                         int iAtomType, int jAtomType) const
00265    { return interaction().forceOverR(rsq, iAtomType, jAtomType); }

00281    /* 
00282    * Return nonBonded Pair interaction energy
00283    */
00284    template <class Interaction>
00285    double MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::energy()
00286    {
00287 
00288       // Update PairList if necessary
00289       if (!isPairListCurrent()) {
00290          buildPairList();
00291       }
00292 
00293       // Loop over pairs
00294       PairIterator iter;
00295       Atom *atom0Ptr;
00296       Atom *atom1Ptr;
00297       double rsq;
00298       double energy=0;
00299       for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00300          iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00301          rsq = boundary().
00302                distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position());
00303          energy += interaction().
00304                    energy(rsq, atom0Ptr->typeId(), atom1Ptr->typeId());
00305       }
00306 
00307       return energy;
00308    } 
00309  
00310    /* 
00311    * Add nonBonded pair forces to atomic forces.
00312    */
00313    template <class Interaction>
00314    void MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::addForces()
00315    {
00316       // Update PairList if necessary
00317       if (!isPairListCurrent()) {
00318          buildPairList();
00319       }
00320 
00321       // Loop over nonbonded neighbor pairs
00322       PairIterator iter;
00323       Vector       force;
00324       double       rsq;
00325       Atom        *atom0Ptr;
00326       Atom        *atom1Ptr;
00327       for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00328          iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00329          rsq = boundary().
00330                distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position(), force);
00331          force *= interaction().
00332                   forceOverR(rsq, atom0Ptr->typeId(), atom1Ptr->typeId());
00333          atom0Ptr->force() += force;
00334          atom1Ptr->force() -= force;
00335       }
00336    } 
00337 
00338    /* 
00339    * Add nonBonded pair forces to atomic forces.
00340    */
00341    template <class Interaction>
00342    template <typename T>
00343    void MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStressImpl(T& stress) const
00344    {
00345 
00346       Vector       dr;
00347       Vector       force;
00348       double       rsq;
00349       PairIterator iter;
00350       Atom        *atom1Ptr;
00351       Atom        *atom0Ptr;
00352 
00353       setToZero(stress);
00354 
00355       // Loop over nonbonded neighbor pairs
00356       for (pairList_.begin(iter); iter.notEnd(); ++iter) {
00357          iter.getPair(atom0Ptr, atom1Ptr);
00358          rsq = boundary().
00359                distanceSq(atom0Ptr->position(), atom1Ptr->position(), dr);
00360          force  = dr;
00361          force *= interaction().
00362                   forceOverR(rsq, atom0Ptr->typeId(), atom1Ptr->typeId());
00363          incrementPairStress(force, dr, stress);
00364       }
00365 
00366       // Normalize by volume 
00367       stress /= boundary().volume();
00368       normalizeStress(stress);
00369 
00370    }
00371 
00372    template <class Interaction>
00373    void MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(double& stress) 
00374         const
00375    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00376 
00377    template <class Interaction>
00378    void MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Vector& stress)
00379         const
00380    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
00381 
00382    template <class Interaction>
00383    void MdPairPotentialImpl<Interaction>::computeStress(Util::Tensor& stress)
00384         const
00385    {  computeStressImpl(stress); }
